questions.question: Is Jesus Christ seated centrally at the table with his hands in a calm gesture?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the central figure at the table is presumed to be Jesus Christ, recognizable by his traditional representation with long hair and beard, wearing a robe. He is seated centrally at the table, which indicates his importance. The hands are extended in a calm manner, signifying a gesture commonly associated with Jesus during the depiction of the Last Supper.

questions.question: Are the apostles positioned around the table displaying varied emotions and gestures characteristic of their interactions?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the figures seated around the central figure (Jesus) resemble the apostles. They are positioned in a way that suggests interaction and engagement, with varied gestures and expressions typical of the Last Supper scene. These characteristics align with the depiction of the apostles displaying a range of emotional responses to Christ's announcement.

questions.question: Is the background featuring windows with a view of distant mountains and symmetrical wall panels still present?
questions.explanation: The background in Image B continues to feature three windows that display a view of the distant mountains, and the wall panels on either side are symmetrical. This backdrop matches the traditional depiction of the environment in the Last Supper scene, emphasizing both interior and exterior views.

questions.question: Is the table covered with a white cloth and populated with bread, dishes, and drinks as depicted in the original?
questions.explanation: Image B shows a long table covered with a white cloth, and it is visibly populated with bread, dishes, and cups. This is consistent with the widely recognized depiction of the Last Supper, where the items on the table are essential elements of the scene.

questions.question: Has a modern man in formal attire been added on the far-right empty space, raising a glass without altering the rest of the composition?
questions.explanation: In Image B, it is evident that a modern man dressed in formal attire has been added to the far-right section of the painting. He is seen holding up a glass, which is discordant with the historical setting of the Last Supper. This addition does not alter the rest of the composition, as all other elements remain faithful to the original setting.
